availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Melvin T. Lowry (circuit and county clerk, jessamine county)

body.p: Born in 1824 in Kentucky, Melvin T. Lowry was the Jessamine county and circuit clerk, where he served for 12 years. He was later a judge in Jessamine county.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine county, p. 145
Bennett Henderson Young, A History of Jessamine County, Kentucky: From Its Earliest Settlement to 1898 (Louisville: Courier Journal 1898), 277.
